description: They’re experts on the heart and blood vessels. You might see them for heart failure, high blood pressure, or an irregular heartbeat.
You would see these doctors for problems with your  colon, and bottom. They can treat colon cancer and inflammatory bowel disease.
Have problems with your skin, hair, nails? Do you have moles, scars, acne, or skin allergies? Dermatologists can help.
These are experts on hormones and metabolism. They can treat conditions like diabetes, thyroid problems,calcium etc.
They’re specialists in digestive organs, including the stomach, bowels, pancreas, liver, and gallbladder.
These are specialists in diseases of the blood, spleen, and lymph glands, like sickle cell disease, anemia, hemophilia, and leukemia.
